sen.j: 近衛天皇（このえてんのう、保延5年5月18日（1139年6月16日） - 久寿2年7月23日（1155年8月22日））は、日本の第76代天皇（在位永治元年12月7日（1142年1月5日） - 久寿2年7月23日（1155年8月22日））。
sen.e: Emperor KONOE (June 16th, 1139 - August 22nd, 1155) was the 76th Japanese Emperor. (his reign was January 5th, 1142 - August 22nd, 1155.)
Emperor Konoe (June 16, 1139 - August 22, 1155) was the seventy-sixth Japanese Emperor (his reign was from January 5, 1142 to August 22, 1155).
Emperor Konoe (June 16, 1139 - August 22, 1155) was the seventy-sixth Japanese Emperor (his reign was from January 5, 1142 to August 22, 1155).

sen.j: 諱を体仁（なりひと）という。
sen.e: His posthumous name was Narihito.
sen.cmt: 諱→personal name[いみな] 諱 サンプル訳より
sen.e: His posthumous name was Narihito.
His posthumous name was Narihito.
He was the 9th Prince of Emperor TOBA.
He was the ninth prince of Emperor Toba.
He was the ninth prince of Emperor Toba.

sen.j: 母は藤原氏の藤原得子（藤原得子）。
sen.e: Hi mother was FUJIWARA no Tokushi of FUJIWARA clan.
sen.cmt: 藤原得子→FUJIWARA no Tokushi [カッコ内は、｢美福門院」の誤り？]
sen.e: Hi mother was FUJIWARA no Tokushi, of the FUJIWARA clan.
His mother was FUJIWARA no Tokushi, of the FUJIWARA clan.

tit.cmt: "Biography" -> "Brief Personal History" に変更しました。

sen.j: 生母の藤原得子が鳥羽天皇の寵愛を受けていたため、わずか2歳で崇徳天皇と代わって即位した。
sen.e: Since his birth mother, FUJIWARA no Tokushi was Emperor TOBA's favorite lady, Emperor KONOE succeeded to the throne after Emperor SUTOKU, when he was two years old.
Since his birth mother, FUJIWARA no Tokushi, was Emperor Toba's favorite lady, Emperor Konoe succeeded to the throne after Emperor Sutoku, when he was two years old.
Since his birth mother, FUJIWARA no Tokushi, was Emperor Toba's favorite lady, Emperor Konoe succeeded to the throne after Emperor Sutoku, when he was two years old.

sen.j: 治世中は鳥羽天皇が院政を敷いた。
sen.e: While he was in power, Emperor TOBA ruled the cloister government.
sen.cmt: 院政→cloister government 英辞郎on the web
sen.e: While he was in power, Emperor TOBA ruled the cloister government.
While he was in power, Emperor Toba ruled the cloister government.

sen.j: 若死したため子は無く、皇位を巡って鳥羽と崇徳天皇が対立したことから保元の乱が起こる。
sen.e: Since the Emperor died young, he did not have any children, the Hogen War occurred in the result of fighting for Imperial succession between Emperor TOBA and Emperor SUTOKU.
Because the Emperor died young, he did not have any children, and the Hogen War occurred in the result of fighting for Imperial succession between Emperor Toba and Emperor Sutoku.
Because the Emperor died young, he did not have any children, and the Hogen War occurred in the result of fighting for Imperial succession between Emperor Toba and Emperor Sutoku.

sen.e: Kyuan July 22nd, 1145 - January 26th, 1151
Kyuan July 22, 1145 - January 26, 1151
Kyuan July 22, 1145 - January 26, 1151

sen.j: 京都市伏見区竹田内畑町の安楽寿院南陵（あんらくじゅいんのみなみのみささぎ）に葬られた｡
sen.e: The Emperor was entombed in Anrakujuin no minami no misasagi, Uchihata-cho Town, Takeda, Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City.
The Emperor was entombed in Anrakujuin no minami no misasagi, Uchihata-cho Town, Takeda, Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City.
